sentences.sContent: Rescue crews had scoured an area of 30 square miles.
sentences.sCn: 救援人员已经搜遍了30平方英里的范围。

synos.tran: 擦，冲刷；洗涤剂；（畜类等的）腹泻

words.tran: 擦洗者，洗刷器；泻药；打光机

trans.tranCn: 冲刷； 擦掉； 四处搜索
trans.tranOther: If you scour something such as a place or a book, you make a thorough search of it to try to find what you are looking for
